requirements.summary: Update text colors throughout the application to ensure optimal contrast and readability, particularly for text overlays on background images
acceptanceCriteria: All text elements have sufficient contrast ratio (WCAG AA minimum 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)
Text on image backgrounds is clearly readable without strain
Color adjustments maintain the existing design aesthetic
Text remains visible in both light and dark conditions

file_operations.description: Enhance global text color variables in the OKLCH color system to improve base text contrast. Ensure foreground color values provide strong contrast against background colors while maintaining the metallic theme. Review and adjust the --foreground, --card-foreground, --popover-foreground, and --primary-foreground variables for both light and dark themes to meet WCAG AA standards.

Review and optimize color token definitions to ensure all text-related color utilities provide sufficient contrast. Verify that custom gold and silver color values work well for text overlays. Add any necessary color utilities for enhanced text contrast on image backgrounds if needed.

requirements.summary: Review and enhance text styling in the HeroSection component where text appears over the furnace background image
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section heading and subheading are clearly visible against the background
Gradient overlay is adjusted if needed to improve text legibility

file_operations.description: Enhance the gradient overlay darkness or opacity to provide stronger contrast for white text elements. Review the heading and subheading text colors, potentially adding text-shadow or adjusting to use brighter/bolder color values. Ensure the text remains clearly visible against the generated/furnace-hero.dim_1920x1080.png background image. Consider increasing gradient opacity from current rgba values or adding a semi-transparent dark backdrop behind text content.

requirements.summary: Enhance text visibility in the ContactSection component where the WhatsApp contact information appears over the refinery interior background image
acceptanceCriteria: Contact card text is easily readable
Phone number and WhatsApp button have strong contrast against the background

file_operations.description: Improve the contact card's background opacity or add a stronger backdrop to ensure phone number 9518553890 and WhatsApp button text are clearly readable over the generated/refinery-interior.dim_1200x800.png background. Consider increasing the card's background opacity, adding a subtle shadow, or adjusting text colors to darker/bolder values for better contrast. Ensure the WhatsApp button maintains strong visual distinction.

requirements.summary: Improve text contrast in ProductCard components, especially for product titles and purity badge text
acceptanceCriteria: Badge text for purity levels has sufficient contrast

file_operations.description: Enhance text contrast for product titles and purity badges. Review and adjust title text color to ensure strong contrast against card backgrounds. For color-coded badges (gold/silver products), verify badge text colors provide sufficient contrast against badge backgrounds. Ensure hover state text remains clearly readable. Consider using darker text colors or adjusting badge background opacity.

Review overlay text on refinery process images (generated/molten-silver.dim_1200x800.png and generated/refinery-machinery.dim_1200x800.png) to ensure text visibility. Adjust overlay darkness, text shadows, or text colors as needed to improve readability during hover effects.

requirements.summary: Review and optimize text colors in the LiveRatesDashboard to ensure price displays, GST breakdown, and percentage changes are easily readable
acceptanceCriteria: Positive/negative percentage changes have clear visual distinction

file_operations.description: Enhance contrast for price values to make them more prominent. Review and strengthen colors used for positive/negative percentage changes to ensure clear visual distinction while maintaining accessibility. Verify GST breakdown text (3% total: 1.5% CGST + 1.5% SGST) has sufficient contrast. Consider using bolder font weights or adjusting text colors for better readability.

Review text contrast in the MCX-style scrolling ticker displaying company name and live rates. Ensure all ticker text (company name, metal prices, trend indicators) has strong contrast against the ticker background. Verify Indian number formatting and percentage displays remain clearly legible throughout the 3.33s animation cycle.
